title: Big Data-Based Physical Education Platform Utilization Competency Enhancement Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic physical education instruction experience and fundamental digital device utilization skills
context.additional_context: A capacity-building program for elementary school administrators to operate data-driven platforms for physical education innovation

learning_goals: It can design learner-customized physical activity programs using big data analytics tools within the platform.
It can improve engagement in online physical education classes by over 20% by applying multimedia network pedagogy.
It can provide posture correction feedback for individual learners using an exercise posture analysis system based on the OpenPose algorithm.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
